solution_line_template: Molly and her parent were {num_parents}+{num_molly} = <<{num_parents}+{num_molly}={initial_group}>>{initial_group} people.
When {people_joined} more people joined, the total number became {initial_group}+{people_joined} = <<{initial_group}+{people_joined}={after_joining}>>{after_joining}
If {people_left} people left before evening, the number reduced to {after_joining}-{people_left} = {final_people} people
